title: Metaball
alt: Shoot, it landed in the golf course. Gonna be hard to get it down the--oh, never mind, it rolled onto the ice hazard. Face-off!
transcript:
[Megan runs towards a bouncing soccer football.][Megan kicks the soccer football upwards.][Cueball leaps towards the ball as it falls towards a basketball hoop. Hairbun also stretches her arm up.]
Ponytail (offscreen):Out![Ponytail walks toward them consulting a piece of paper divided in sections:]
[Megan (offscreen):] What do you mean, out?!
Ponytail: The ball clipped the corner of the baseball zone. Infield fly rule.
[Megan (offscreen):] Aw, maaan...
